pr_title: SONARJAVA-3183 S3329 should consider the call to SecureRandom.generat…

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3183 S3329 should consider the call to SecureRandom.generateSeed() as safe
SONARJAVA-3183 S3329 should consider the call to SecureRandom.generateSeed() as safe

timeline.bodyText: you should reuse declaration instead of symbol.declaration() here.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText: ECJ can be quite tricky here. In case of strange resolution/recovery from its engine, it might assign an unknown symbol rather than a VariableSymbol. Before casting, I would check that the symbol is not unknown.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar
